title: verify_salon_search_functionality
description: Test the GET /api/v1/beautybooking/salons/search endpoint to ensure it returns correct salon search results based on filters like category, location, rating, and availability, and respects the ranking algorithm.

title: validate_booking_creation_and_lifecycle
description: Test the POST /api/v1/beautybooking/bookings endpoint for creating bookings and verify the complete booking lifecycle including confirmation, cancellation, completion, and no-show handling.

title: check_advanced_calendar_availability
description: Test the GET /api/v1/beautybooking/calendar/availability endpoint to verify staff availability considering working hours, holidays, breaks, and manual calendar blocks.

title: test_automatic_badge_assignment
description: Test the GET /api/v1/beautybooking/badges endpoint to verify automatic badge assignment for salons based on rating, bookings, cancellation rate, and subscription status.

title: validate_revenue_model_calculations
description: Test financial endpoints such as GET /api/v1/beautybooking/finance/revenue to ensure commissions, fees, subscriptions, and other revenue streams are calculated and reported accurately.

title: verify_customer_gift_card_redemption
description: Test the POST /api/v1/beautybooking/gift-cards/redeem endpoint to ensure customers can redeem gift cards correctly and the wallet balance updates accordingly.

title: test_vendor_staff_management_apis
description: Test vendor authenticated endpoints POST /api/v1/beautybooking/staff, PUT /api/v1/beautybooking/staff/{id}, and DELETE /api/v1/beautybooking/staff/{id} for adding, updating, and deleting staff members.

title: validate_search_ranking_algorithm
description: Test the search and ranking algorithm by verifying that GET /api/v1/beautybooking/salons/search returns results ordered correctly based on location, rating, activity, featured status, returning customer rate, and availability.

title: verify_real_time_notifications_delivery
description: Test the real-time notification system to ensure booking status updates, reminders, and promotions are delivered timely and accurately to customers, vendors, and admins.

title: test_loyalty_points_and_campaigns_endpoints
description: Test GET /api/v1/beautybooking/loyalty/points and GET /api/v1/beautybooking/loyalty/campaigns endpoints to verify correct retrieval of loyalty points and active campaigns for customers.
